info.title: Comprando API V1
info.description: This is the first version of the API used for the  **mobile clients** (*iOS and Andriod*). It will focus on the buyer's operations.  Visit [http://comprando.io/](http://comprando.io/). Jira [http://jira.comprando.io/](http://jira.comprando.io/), Documentation and Wiki [http://docs.comprando.io](http://docs.comprando.io), API Documentation [http://apidocs.comprando.io/](http://apidocs.comprando.io/) and the Stagging server [http://stagging.comprando.io/](http://stagging.comprando.io/).

post.description: This is the entry point for the API you have to get the JSON Web Token to access the rest of API resources.

requestBody.description: You have to provide some paramters to authenticate, send Email or Mobile and password

post.description: Add a user to the system

requestBody.description: To register send the following Full name, Email, Mobile, Password and Avatar as base64 string

post.summary: Verify the mobile number with the code sent
post.description: Send verification code to Twilio to complete the verification process

requestBody.description: send the verification code in the body

post.description: Resend the verification code again to the registered user mobile

requestBody.description: To register send the following Full name, Email, Mobile, Password and Avatar as base64 string

get.description: Return all the supported countries with country code and the flag
Return all regions based on country or city parameterse

parameters.name: country_id
parameters.description: Specifies the id of the country to filter with

parameters.name: city_id
parameters.description: Specifies the id of the city to filter with

200.description: Successfully returned a list of shops categories

get.summary: List nearby/offshore shops based on parameters
get.description: List nearby/offshore shops based on parameters

parameters.name: shop_type
parameters.description: Determine the type of the desired shops ( nearby / offshore )

parameters.name: shop_name
parameters.description: Specifies shop name to search with

parameters.name: category_id
parameters.description: Specifies category id to filter shops

parameters.name: city_id
parameters.description: Specifies the id of the city to search in

parameters.name: region_id
parameters.description: Specifies the id of the region to search in

200.description: Successfully returned a list of shops

shop.name: Alef
shop.description: One of biggest bookstores in Egypt

get.summary: List all featured shops for the slider
get.description: Return all featured shops optianly on category_id

parameters.name: category_id
parameters.description: Specifies the id of the category to filter with

get.description: List shop products with their categories

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: The shop id which the products belong to

200.description: Successfully returned a list of shop products

get.description: View prodct details with its category

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: The shop id which the product belongs to

parameters.name: product_id
parameters.description: The product id which will be displayed

200.description: Successfully returned an object of product contains the product details

post.description: Send forget password instructions to the user's email address

message.example: An email has been sent to your email, please follow the instructions

requestBody.description: You have to provide the user's email address to reset his password
